job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field

secondary: Ability to work in English (written and spoken)
all: Ability to work in English (written and spoken)

jd: From: Bandana Das, iTech US bandana.d@itechus.net Reply to: bandana.d@itechus.net Hi, Greetings, This is Bandana from ITech US Inc. Given below are the details of the position with one of our clients and was wondering if you would be interested or can recommend someone who would be interested in this job. Role: Java Full stack Developer with Card payment DomainLocation: Phoenix, AZ (Need local ID proof)Duration: 12+ Months Contract Onsite from Day 1 Visa: H1B | Need passport number along with the submission Must Have Technical Skills • Java8, 11• Spring Boot with Microservices• Experience in Payment Card Network Domain.• Hydra• Kubernetes• Terraform• Helms• Github actions• Consul• Vault• Couchbase, Postgres DB• Python Scripting• Familiar with Agile or other rapid application development methods• Strong analytical ability• Excellent communication skills• Ability to work in English (written and spoken)Domain Knowledge• Designing and implementing solutions to leverage a Kubernetes cluster. • Configuring hardware, peripherals, and services, managing settings and storage.• Deploying, monitoring, and supporting applications in a Kubernetes environment. • Researching opportunities for automation, troubleshooting issues as reported by users.• Scripting with Python Education: At least a bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field is required Thanks & RegardsBANDANA DAS
